document_data.title: The Complete Psionics Handbook

document_data.inter_artist:

document_data.mainbody:
'''''The Complete Psionics Handbook''''' is a 2{{nd}}-edition ''Advanced Dungeons & Dragons'' accessory.

{{Quote|''Are you ready for the mind-blowing potential of the psyche? This handbook describes over 150 paranormal powers—telepathy, ESP, clairvoyance, psychokinesis, biofeedback, out-of-body travel—plus many amazing talents never before revealed. The psionicist is a completely new character class for AD&D<sup>®</sup> games, both for player characters and NPCs. Explore inner space! Now you can really put mind over matter with ''The Complete Psionics Handbook''.''}}
document_data.Description:
''The Complete Psionics Handbook'' is the 5{{th}} book in the [[PHBR series|Player's Handbook Rules series]].

The book contains over 150 psionic powers, and includes an entire chapter on psychic combat. The book also includes psionic monsters. The book has a discussion of society's reaction to psionicists, and a section describing the role of psionics in various TSR campaign settings
document_data.Chapters:
*Introduction
*Chapter 1: The Psionicist
*Chapter 2: Psionic Combat
*Chapter 3: Clairsentience
*Chapter 4: Psychokinesis
*Chapter 5: Psychometabolism
*Chapter 6: Psychoportation
*Chapter 7: Telepathy
*Chapter 8: Metapsionics
*Chapter 9: A Psionics Campaign
